author: Staff Reporter
text:
A fire broke out at garbage dumped in Gandhi Nagar in Suramangalam Zone here on Wednesday. Fire and Rescue Service personnel brought the fire under control.

Residents of Gandhi Nagar and Jagir Ammapalayam said that a woman resident in the area used to collect waste materials, including plastic bottles and covers, and dump them in the vacant land in the area. She used to collect the waste materials from other streets and dump in the land and sell it every month.

Stench emanated from the garbage and she had refused to remove them.

Residents also said that they have submitted many petitions to the corporation seeking action against her as it caused health problems for them.

Though residents tried to put out the fire, it spread quickly and all the dumped materials were razed in the fire.

The cause of the fire is under investigation.
title: Garbage catches fire
